ResourceHeader.Description: Galileo PLasma Spectrometer data acquired by the Galileo Orbiter during the magnetospheric survey portion of the mission

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse".. See the Rules of the road at http://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html. Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA Web application
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data via CDPP/AMDA Web application.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse".. See the Rules of the road at http://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html. Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

NumericalData.Caveats: Parameters : * E4 and P4 sensors are perpendicular to Galileo spin axis * P2 and P6 are next to P1 and P7 sensors which are parallel to Galileo spin axis

Parameter.Name: ions p2
Parameter.Description: energy-time spectrogram of ion counts for the P2 detector

Parameter.Name: ions p4
Parameter.Description: energy-time spectrogram of ion counts for the P4 detector

Parameter.Name: ions p6
Parameter.Description: energy-time spectrogram of ion counts for the P6 detector

Parameter.Name: electrons e4
Parameter.Description: energy-time spectrogram of ion counts for the E4 detector
